overview: The twisting, neon discomfort of body parts pulsates and trembles from the depths of the deepest ocean up to the cold and unforgiving vastness of space. Bones and tendons dislocate from performer Devoursâ€™s earthly queer vessel. A hand becomes the new building block of the universe: evolving from single cell, to fish, to mammal. Devours brings the genesis of a strange new planet of beard-based lifeforms.
title: Garnet Graves
